Articles.Content: The blue button that lets you unlock new parts of the tech tree for science points keeps disappearing. I have 113 points. Am I missing something?
How much do the new parts cost?

@Kerbart: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tech_tree

OP, how much of the tech tree have you unlocked so far?

I'm on a Mac, if that makes any difference.

Yeah it looks to me like the blue button is off the bottom of the screen. Look in your second shot the amount of whitespace (well, greyspace) between the button and the "Electrics" icon. That's about the same amount of space between the "Electrics" icon and the bottom of the screen in your first image.

I also notice that in your first image, everything is a normal size and in the 2nd, stuff is squished vertically. I assume you didn't doctor the images.

I'd report this as a bug.
